valuation_report.purpose: VALUATION OF PROPERTY FOR KENNEDY KIPCHIRCHIR KOECH TAS BULLION VAULT

location.description: The property is situated approximately 350 meters off Elgeyo Road, 220 meters to the West of Kapsoya AIC Church, 1.2 kilometres due Northeast of Rupa’s Mall and 4 kilometres to the East of Eldoret CBD within Kapsoya Estate in Eldoret, Kapsoya Ward, Ainabkoi Sub- County, Uasin Gishu County.

property_description.general_description: The property is developed with a 3-bedroom bungalow and an extension consisting of 2 No. 1-bedroom units.
property_description.plot_and_site_works: The plot is a rectangular shaped of red soils with a fairly level gradient whose boundaries are marked with a masonry stone wall topped with razor wire. Access into the property is via a double-leaf metal plate gate opening into the compound.
property_description.services: Mains electricity, water and sewer are connected to the property. The immediate access road to the property is earth surfaced.

bungalow_construction.roof: Fascia boarded timber trusses overlaid in box profile iron sheets.
bungalow_construction.ceilings: Wooden strips and soft board panels.
bungalow_construction.walls: Dressed natural stones keyed and master tendered externally, plastered and painted internally. Wet rooms have walls lined with ceramic tiles to dado level.
bungalow_construction.doors: External doors are glazed steel type. Internal doors are timber flush types.
bungalow_construction.windows: These are glazed steel casements types.
bungalow_construction.floors: Mass concrete slabs finished in ceramic tiles.
bungalow_construction.fittings: Fittings include cement stainless steel sink to the kitchen, ceramic worktops and wardrobe to the bedrooms.

property_description.bungalow_accommodation: Entrance; Lounge; Dining area; Kitchen; Pantry; Passageway with a WHB; 2 No. bedrooms; Cloakroom with an overhead shower; Cloakroom with a WC; Master bedroom en-suite with a WC, WHB, overhead shower and a bathtub.
property_description.extension_accommodation: 2 No. One bedroom units each with: Entrance; Lounge; Kitchen; 1 No. bedroom; Cloakroom with a WC, WHB and an overhead shower;

market_assessment: Plots of similar size within Kapsoya go for KES 3,000,000 - KES 4,000,000. Comparable house listings range from KES 7,800,000 - KES 8,500,000.

current_market_value.amount_words: Kenya Shillings Eight Million Five Hundred Thousand

lease_details.lessee: JOHNSON MWANGI MUIGA and JANE WAITHIRA MWANGI
lease_details.restriction: NO DISPOSITION BY THE PROPRIETOR SHALL BE REGISTERED WITHOUT THE WRITTEN CONSENT OF THE LESSOR (S. 48)

compliance.matrimonial_property_act_2013: The property is registered in the names of Johnson Mwangi Muiga and Jane Waithira Mwangi, hence it is a matrimonial home.
